# OpenClaw Dev Team - LLM Context

> This file provides structured context for LLMs about this project.

## Project

```
name: openclaw-dev-team
version: 0.1.0
description: AI-powered development team for OpenClaw - multi-agent orchestration system
license: MIT
repository: https://github.com/vhfmatks/openclaw-dev-team
```

## Purpose

OpenClaw Dev Team enables automated software development through Telegram:

1. User sends a development request via Telegram
2. AI agents analyze, plan, implement, and test
3. User receives completed code with verification

## Architecture

```
Telegram Message
      â”‚
      â–¼
â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”

â”‚ dev-team-triggerâ”‚

â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”¬â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜

```

## Components

### Skills

| Name | Function |
|------|----------|
| dev-team-orchestrator | Coordinates all agents, manages pipeline |
| dev-team-planner | Analyzes requests, creates implementation plan |
| dev-team-executor | Writes code based on plan |
| dev-team-validator | Tests code in browser, captures screenshots |

### Hooks

| Name | Event | Action |
|------|-------|--------|
| dev-team-trigger | message:received | Detect dev keywords, trigger orchestrator |

## Pipeline Phases

1. **Planning** (10%): Analyze request, decompose tasks
2. **Execution** (60%): Generate code, create files
3. **Validation** (20%): Browser test, verify functionality
4. **Delivery** (10%): Send results to user

## Trigger Keywords

```
Korean:  ë§Œë“¤ì–´ì¤˜, êµ¬í˜„í•´ì¤˜, ê°œë°œí•´ì¤˜, ì¶”ê°€í•´ì¤˜, ìˆ˜ì •í•´ì¤˜, ê³ ì³ì¤˜
English: build me, create, implement, develop, make a, add a, fix the
```

## State Management

Location: `~/.openclaw/workspace/dev-team/`

```
state/
â”œâ”€â”€ current-task.json    # Active task
â”œâ”€â”€ agent-status.json    # Agent states
â””â”€â”€ pipeline-phase.txt   # Current phase

plans/      # Generated plans
reports/    # Validation reports
screenshots/# Test screenshots
memory/     # Learned patterns
```

## Installation

```bash
# Quick install
git clone https://github.com/vhfmatks/openclaw-dev-team.git /tmp/ocdt
cp -r /tmp/ocdt/skills/* ~/.openclaw/skills/
cp -r /tmp/ocdt/hooks/* ~/.openclaw/hooks/
mkdir -p ~/.openclaw/workspace/dev-team/{state,plans,reports,screenshots,memory}
openclaw skills enable dev-team-orchestrator dev-team-planner dev-team-executor dev-team-validator
openclaw hooks enable dev-team-trigger
openclaw restart
```


## Related Technologies

- OpenClaw: https://docs.openclaw.ai/
- OpenClaw Skills: https://docs.openclaw.ai/tools/skills
- OpenClaw Hooks: https://docs.openclaw.ai/automation/hooks
- Playwright: https://playwright.dev/ (for browser testing)

## Key Concepts

### Skill (OpenClaw)
Modular package that adds capabilities. Defined by SKILL.md with YAML frontmatter.

### Hook (OpenClaw)
Event handler that runs on specific events (message:received, command:new, etc.).

### Pipeline
Sequential execution of phases: Planning â†’ Execution â†’ Validation â†’ Delivery

## Usage Example

```
User (Telegram): "ë¡œê·¸ì¸ í˜ì´ì§€ ë§Œë“¤ì–´ì¤˜"

Bot: ğŸ”„ ê°œë°œ ìš”ì²­ì„ ê°ì§€í–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. ì‘ì—…ì„ ì‹œì‘í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤...
     ğŸ“‹ Phase 1/4: Planning...
     âœ… Phase 1 ì™„ë£Œ

     âœ… Phase 2 ì™„ë£Œ (3 files created)
     ğŸ§ª Phase 3/4: Validation...
     âœ… Phase 3 ì™„ë£Œ
     ğŸ“¦ Phase 4/4: Delivery...
     âœ… ì „ì²´ ì™„ë£Œ!
     ğŸ“ src/components/Login.tsx
     ğŸ“¸ [Screenshot attached]
```

## Limitations (Current MVP)

- Single cycle (no auto-retry on failure)
- No parallel execution
- Basic browser testing only

## Future Enhancements

- Self-validation loop (auto-retry on test failure)
- Parallel agent execution
- Progress streaming to Telegram
- Multiple project support
